com.defano.jmonet.tools

Class PolygonTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.BasicTool<PolylineToolDelegate>
      • com.defano.jmonet.tools.base.PolylineTool
        • com.defano.jmonet.tools.PolygonTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SurfaceInteractionObserver, PolylineToolDelegate, Tool, KeyListener, EventListener

    public class PolygonTool
extends PolylineTool
implements PolylineToolDelegate
    Tool to draw outlined or filled irregular polygons on the canvas.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillPolygon(Scratch scratch, Paint fillPaint, int[] xPoints, int[] yPoints)
      Draws a filled polygon.
      void strokePolygon(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint strokePaint, int[] xPoints, int[] yPoints)
      Draws one or more sides (edges) of a polygon, closing the shape as needed.
      void strokePolyline(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint paint, int[] xPoints, int[] yPoints)
      Draws one or more sides (edges) of a polygon which is not filled and may not be closed.
